title: Cap Stand, mid-18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: On globe a cartouche of gesturing figure, and a floral design. Blue and mauve (manganese).

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Stand, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Earthenware; Faience, underglaze decoration. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-60-5.
